serviceDescription: AI-powered development environment with command execution and hot reload capabilities. Build and modify React/Next.js applications through natural conversation.

provisionEnvironment.description: Provision a new isolated development environment for building applications.

executeCommand.description: Execute a shell command in the development environment.

performFileOperation.description: Perform file operations like listing, reading, writing, creating, updating, and deleting files or directories.

getTaskStatus.description: Check the status of a running task.

changeDirectory.description: Change the working directory for subsequent commands.

createReactApp.description: Create a new React or Next.js application with hot reload enabled.

modifyFile.description: Modify a file in the development environment. Changes reflect immediately with hot reload.

setEnvironmentVariable.description: Set an environment variable in the development environment.
